name: source/Component.js

params.name: template
params.description: HTML source or sub DOM tree

name: setAccessor
description:
Define a set of Getter or Setter for DOM properties,
and store their values into private object.

params.name: map
params.description:
`1` for Getter, `2` for Setter & sum for both
                      in each key's value

return.description: The index of `element` in its siblings
The target of `event` object (**Shadow DOM** is in account)

params.name: event
params.description: Event object which is created and only bubbles in the Shadow DOM

return.description: Default behavior of this event can be executed or not
Element set which matches `selector` in this Shadow DOM

watch
description: Add a watched property to this view instance

name: source/view/Template.js

params.name: varName
params.description: Name list of the Local variable

params.name: parameter
params.description: One or more value of the Local variable

name: ChangedCallback
description: Call back only on Value changed

name: source/view/View.js

params.name: nameKey
params.description:
Key (littleCamelCase) of HTML `data-*`
                                                    to get name of bound data

params.name: parent
params.description: Parent view in the DOM tree

return.description: This view or the view bound before
Full markup code of this view

name: parent
description: Parent view in current DOM tree

name: rootHost
description: Host element of a view in a Shadow DOM tree

name: valueOf
description: Get original data of this view

name: render
description: Render this view with data or Update without data

name: clear
description: Reset this view to empty data

name: source/WebCell.js
multipleMap
description: Equivalent to the integration of Array's map() & filter() methods

params.name: filter
params.description: Return `item` itself to reserve, `undefined` or `null` to ignore, or Array to merge in.

name: extend
description:
Merge own properties of two or more objects together into the first object
by their descriptor

params.name: target
params.description:
An object that will receive the new properties
                            if `source` are passed in

params.name: source
params.description: Additional objects containing properties to merge in

name: mapTree
description: Traverse Object-tree & return Node array through the filter

return.description:
`Null` or `Undefined` to **Skip the Sub-Tree**,
                   and Any other Type to Add into the Result Array.
Whether current script is running in a sub DOM
Whether current script is in `<head />` of a DOM
